CustomField.description: Identifies applicable reassignment reason for case reassignments triggered as a result of receiving this event message. Applicable only when IsCaseReassignmentEligible__c = true.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies applicable reassignment reason for case reassignments triggered as a result of receiving this event message. Applicable only when IsCaseReassignmentEligible__c = true.
CustomField.label: Case Automation Reassignment Reason
